data.description: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

data.name: In the Heat of the Night
data.description: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

data.name: Bedazzled
data.description: A hapless loser sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but has trouble winning over the girl of his dreams.

data.name: Wait Until Dark
data.description: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

data.name: Berserk
data.description: A scheming circus owner finds her authority challenged when a vicious killer targets the show.

data.name: The Fearless Vampire Killers
data.description: A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.

data.name: Le Samouraï
data.description: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

data.name: Asterix the Gaul
data.description: Asterix, the most cunning warrior of a Gaulish village resisting Roman occupation, must save their magic potion-brewing druid when he is kidnapped by a Centurion.

data.name: Son of Godzilla

data.name: Uchû daikaijû Girara
data.description: When a crew of scientists returns from Mars with a sample of the space spores that contaminated their ship, the sample escapes and grows into an enormous, rampaging beaked beast.

data.name: Gamera vs. Gyaos
data.description: Volcanic activity unleashes a bloodthirsty monster called Gyaos that Gamera must confront.

data.name: Branded to Kill
data.description: After a botched assignment, a rice-fetishizing hitman finds himself in conflict with his organization, and one mysterious, dangerous fellow-hitman in particular.

data.name: Peppermint Frappé
data.description: Julian, a middle-aged single doctor, meets his childhood friend Pablo again. The latter is back from Africa and has just married a beautiful young blonde, Elena. Julian falls in love with ...

data.name: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
data.description: Various factions, including a half-breed bandit, a gang of homosexual cowboys, and a priest, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

data.name: Horus: Prince of the Sun
data.description: A boy with a mythical sword wants to protect a Norse village from an evil ice wizard and his minions, who destroyed his family's village. However, the villagers don't fully trust him and a mysterious girl with a dark secret befriends him.

data.name: Planet of the Apes
data.description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet where highly intelligent non-human ape species are dominant and humans are enslaved.

data.name: Charly
data.description: An intellectually disabled man undergoes an experiment that gives him the intelligence of a genius.

data.name: Rosemary's Baby
data.description: A young couple trying for a baby moves into an aging, ornate apartment building on Central Park West, where they find themselves surrounded by peculiar neighbors.

data.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
data.description: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins - a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

data.name: Where Eagles Dare
data.description: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

data.name: Yellow Submarine
data.description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

data.name: Star!
data.description: A musical biography of Gertrude Lawrence, who led a hustling and bustling life on the stage.

data.name: Hellfighters
data.description: Divorced Chance Buckman fights international oil rig fires. An injury brings his daughter and to his dismay, she weds Greg, a team member. Chance gets a desk-job, so he and Madelyn remarry, but a Venezuelan oil rig fire reunites them.

data.name: Barbarella
data.description: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

data.name: The Lion in Winter
data.description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. When he allows his imprisoned wife Eleanor of Aquitaine out for a Christmas visit, they all variously plot to force him into a decision.

data.name: If....
data.description: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.

data.name: Head
data.description: The Monkees are tossed about in a psychedelic, surrealist, plotless, circular bit of fun fluff.

data.name: Night of the Living Dead
data.description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

data.name: Carry on Up the Khyber
data.description: Sir Sidney Ruff-Diamond looks after the British outpost near the Khyber Pass. Protected by the kilted Third Foot and Mouth regiment, you would think they were safe but the Khazi of Kalabar has other ideas.

data.name: The Bride Wore Black
data.description: Julie Kohler is prevented from suicide by her mother. She leaves the town. She will track down, charm and kill five men who do not know her. What is her goal? What is her purpose?

data.name: Asterix and Cleopatra
data.description: Ordered by Cleopatra to build a palace in Alexandria within three months as part of a bet with Caesar, an architect enlists the help of Asterix, Obelix and Getafix.

data.name: Funny Girl
data.description: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

data.name: Hour of the Wolf
data.description: While vacationing on a remote German island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

data.name: Destroy All Monsters
data.description: At the turn of the century, Earth's monsters have been safely rounded up and studied on Monsterland. Chaos erupts when a race of she-aliens known as the Kilaaks unleashes the monsters across the world.

data.name: Mafia
data.description: Following a murder in a small Sicilian town, the new chief of the Carabinieri must fight corrupt officials, the frightened silence of witnesses and the local Mafia boss in order to solve the case.

data.name: Gamera vs. Viras
data.description: Gamera the Flying Turtle falls under the spell of evil aliens, but two children free him and he returns to fight the aliens' monster, Viras.

data.name: Bullitt
data.description: An all-guts, no-glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

data.name: Ice Station Zebra
data.description: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

data.name: Dracula Has Risen from the Grave
data.description: When Castle Dracula is exorcised by the Monsignor, it accidentally brings the Count back from the dead. Dracula follows the Monsignor back to his hometown, preying on the holy man's beautiful niece and her friends.

data.name: Stars of Eger
data.description: 1552, the great Turkish Empire wants to conquer Europe, and the world. The last stand is Hungarian Kingdom, and the castle of Eger. The brave soldiers decides they will fight till the end of their lives.

data.name: The Wrecking Crew
data.description: Gold bullion worth USD 1 billion has been stolen from a hijacked train in Denmark. The main suspect is Count Massimo Contini. The US government sends Matt Helm, one of its top agents, to investigate and recover the gold.

data.name: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
data.description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

data.name: Today We Kill, Tomorrow We Die!
data.description: A man released after a jail term for a crime he did not commit, raises a gang to go after the man who framed him.

data.name: Oliver!
data.description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor in 1830s London.

data.name: The Valley of Death
data.description: An army gold shipment and its escort vanish in the Ozarks, prompting accusations of theft and desertion but frontiersman Old Shatterhand and Apache chief Winnetou help solve the mystery of the missing army gold.

data.name: Django, Prepare a Coffin
data.description: A gunfighter forms a gang of deceased execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

data.name: The Rape of the Vampire
data.description: After a psychoanalyst unsuccessfully tries to convince four sisters that they are not 200 year old vampires, the Queen of the Vampires promulgates the cause of the Undead.

data.name: The Honeymoon Killers
data.description: An obese, embittered nurse doesn't mind if her toupee-wearing boyfriend romances and fleeces other women, as long as he takes her along on his con jobs.

data.name: My Side of the Mountain
data.description: As young Sam Gribley runs away he learns about nature.

data.name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
data.description: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

data.name: Easy Rider
data.description: Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.

data.name: The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes
data.description: At Medfield College, an accident with a donated computer gives Dexter Riley the ability to remember any knowledge learned instantly and perfectly.

data.name: Downhill Racer
data.description: Quietly cocky Robert Redford joins U.S. ski team as downhill racer and clashes with the team's coach, played by Gene Hackman. Lots of good skiing action leading to an exciting climax.

data.name: The Italian Job
data.description: A comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

data.name: Kes
data.description: A working-class English boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.

data.name: True Grit
data.description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

data.name: Mississippi Mermaid
data.description: A wealthy plantation owner is captivated by a mysterious woman with a shady past.

data.name: Army of Shadows
data.description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

data.name: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
data.description: James Bond woos a mob boss' daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Ernst Stavro Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps involving beautiful women from around the world.

data.name: Hello, Dolly!
data.description: Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for half-a-millionaire Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.

data.name: All Monsters Attack
data.description: A latchkey child living in the industrial city of Kawasaki confronts his loneliness through his escapist dreams of Monster Island and friendship with Minilla.

data.name: Age of Consent
data.description: A grizzled Australian painter decides to jolt his stale creativity by moving to a remote island on the Great Barrier Reef, where he takes on an alluring, uninhibited young woman as his muse.

data.name: Take the Money and Run
data.description: The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.

data.name: Z
data.description: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

data.name: La Piscine
data.description: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

data.name: Django the Bastard
data.description: A mysterious stranger appears to take terrifying revenge on former Confederate officers who during the Civil War betrayed and were responsible for the massacre of their unit.

data.name: Le Cercle Rouge
data.description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

data.name: The AristoCats
data.description: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

data.name: The Phantom Tollbooth
data.description: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.

data.name: Two Mules for Sister Sara
data.description: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.

data.name: The Vampire Lovers
data.description: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

data.name: Scars of Dracula
data.description: A young man, Paul Carlson, is on a trip and spends the night at Count Dracula's castle. He is murdered. After some time has passed, the young man's brother Simon comes to the small town where all the traces end to look for him.

data.name: Taste the Blood of Dracula
data.description: Three distinguished English gentlemen accidentally resurrect Count Dracula, killing a disciple of his in process. The Count seeks to avenge his dead servant, by making the trio die in the hands of their own children.

data.name: House of Dark Shadows
data.description: Vampire Barnabas Collins is accidentally released from his centuries-long confinement at his family's estate in Maine. He targets his clueless descendants who live there now and pursues Maggie, the incarnation of his lost love.

data.name: Airport
data.description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

data.name: The Music Lovers
data.description: Piano teacher Peter Ilych Tchaikovsky struggles against his homosexuality by marrying, but unfortunately he chooses a nymphomaniac whom he cannot satisfy.

data.name: Darling Lili
data.description: Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend.

data.name: Colossus: The Forbin Project
data.description: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

data.name: Count Dracula
data.description: Count Dracula, a vampire who regains his youth by drinking the blood of maidens, is pursued in London and Transylvania by Professor Van Helsing, Jonathan Harker and Quincey Morris.

data.name: Donkey Skin
data.description: A fairy godmother helps a princess disguise and flee the kingdom so she won't have to marry the king who happens to be her father.

data.name: Little Big Man
data.description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

data.name: Waterloo

data.name: Tora! Tora! Tora!

data.name: Catch-22
data.description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

data.name: The Railway Children
data.description: After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

data.name: Wanda
data.description: Wanda, a lonely housewife, drifts through mining country until she meets a petty thief who takes her in.

data.name: Pippi in the South Seas
data.description: With the help of her friends Tommy and Annika, Pippi Longstocking ventures to the South Pacific island Porto Piluse to rescue her father, who was captured by ruthless pirates.

data.name: Rio Lobo
data.description: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the two traitors whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

data.name: Patton
data.description: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

data.name: Le Boucher
data.description: An unlikely friendship between a dour, working class butcher and a repressed schoolteacher coincides with a grisly series of Ripper-type murders in a provincial French town.

data.name: Walkabout
data.description: Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his walkabout: a ritual separation from his tribe.

data.name: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
data.description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

data.name: THX 1138

data.name: Bedknobs and Broomsticks

data.name: Straw Dogs

data.name: Shaft
data.description: Cool black private eye John Shaft is hired by a crime lord to find and retrieve his kidnapped daughter.

data.name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
data.description: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

data.name: Play Misty for Me
data.description: The life of a disc jockey is turned upside down after a romantic encounter with an obsessed fan.

data.name: The Legend of Frenchie King

data.name: Mary, Queen of Scots

data.name: Lust for a Vampire
data.description: In 1830, forty years to the day since the last manifestation of their dreaded vampirism, the Karnstein heirs use the blood of an innocent to bring forth the evil that is the beautiful Mircalla - or as she was in 1710, Carmilla.

data.name: Let's Scare Jessica to Death
data.description: A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.

data.name: The French Connection
data.description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

data.name: The Lady Hermit
data.description: Martial arts star Cheng Pei pei and versatile director Ho Meng hua were a great team, who elevated this tale of a virtuous swordswoman's revenge on the Black Demon who injured her to one of the best of both their careers.

data.name: Diamonds Are Forever
data.description: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an evil plot involving a rich business tycoon.

data.name: Godzilla vs. Hedorah
data.description: An ever evolving alien life-form from the Dark Gaseous Nebula arrives to consume rampant pollution. Spewing mists of sulfuric acid and corrosive sludge, neither humanity or Godzilla may be able to defeat this toxic menace.

data.name: Wake in Fright
data.description: After a bad gambling bet, a schoolteacher is marooned in a town full of crazy, drunk, violent men who threaten to make him just as crazy, drunk, and violent.

data.name: Klute
data.description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

data.name: The House That Dripped Blood
data.description: An anthology of four horror stories revolving around a mysterious rental house in the U.K.

data.name: The Devils
data.description: In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier's protection of the city of Loudun from the corrupt Cardinal Richelieu is undermined by a sexually-repressed nun's accusation of witchcraft.

data.name: Nicholas and Alexandra
data.description: Tsar Nicholas II, the inept last monarch of Russia, insensitive to the needs of his people, is overthrown and exiled to Siberia with his family.

data.name: Vampyros Lesbos
data.description: An erotic horror tale about a vixen vampiress seducing and killing women to appease her insatiable thirst for female blood.

data.name: Get Carter
data.description: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

data.name: 10 Rillington Place
data.description: What happened to the women at 10 Rillington Place? The story of British serial killer John Christie, who committed most or all of his crimes in the titular terraced house, and the miscarriage of justice involving Timothy Evans.

data.name: Macbeth
data.description: A ruthlessly ambitious Scottish lord seizes the throne with the help of his scheming wife and a trio of witches.

data.name: Werewolves on Wheels
data.description: A biker gang and its leader fall prey to a satan worshipper and his cult.

data.name: Hannie Caulder
data.description: After she is raped and her husband murdered, a woman hires a bounty hunter to instruct her in the use of a gun so she can get her revenge on the three outlaws responsible.

data.name: The Emigrants
data.description: Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.

data.name: Punishment Park
data.description: Punishment Park is a pseudo-documentary purporting to be a film crews's news coverage of the team of soldiers escorting a group of hippies, draft dodgers, and anti-establishment types ...

data.name: Daughters of Darkness
data.description: While passing through a vacation resort, a newlywed couple encounters a mysterious, strikingly beautiful countess and her aide.

data.name: Vanishing Point
data.description: During the 1970s, car delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time but always runs into trouble with the highway cops.

data.name: Johnny Got His Gun
data.description: During World War I, a patriotic young American is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.

data.name: The Andromeda Strain
data.description: A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.

data.name: Solaris
data.description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

data.name: Pink Flamingos
data.description: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as The Filthiest Person Alive.

data.name: A Gorgeous Girl Like Me
data.description: Stanislas Previne is a young sociologist, preparing a thesis on criminal women. He meets in prison Camille Bliss to interview her. Camille is accused to have murdered her lover Arthur and ...

data.name: The Godfather
data.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

data.name: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
data.description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

data.name: Don't Torture a Duckling
data.description: When a southern Italian town is rocked by a string of child murders, the police and two urban outcasts search for the culprit amid scapegoating within the superstitious community.

data.name: Deliverance
data.description: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

data.name: Jeremiah Johnson
data.description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.
A musical retelling of the American Revolution's political struggle in the Continental Congress to declare independence.

data.name: Travels with My Aunt
data.description: At his mother's funeral, banker Henry meets his Aunt Augusta, an eccentric old woman who takes him on a wild adventure to rescue an old lover.

data.name: The Dawns Here Are Quiet
data.description: During WWII in a small village outpost, a commander has his troop replaced by an all female unit. As they finally begin to appreciate one another, German paratroopers are spotted nearby and the realities of war emerge.

data.name: The Poseidon Adventure
data.description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

data.name: Night of the Dark Full Moon
data.description: A man inherits a mansion which once was a mental home. He visits the place and begins to investigate some crimes that happened in old times, scaring the people living in the region.

data.name: Sleuth
data.description: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

data.name: Prison Girls
data.description: A prison psychiatrist prepares six female inmates for parole by granting them a weekend furlough, during which each of them has a sexual encounter.

data.name: The Mattei Affair
data.description: An Italian industrialist died in a plane crash. An accident or an assassination?

data.name: Money Money Money
data.description: When they realize the times are changing, five crooks decide to switch from bank robberies to personality abductions. Among their hostages are singer Johnny Hallyday and an ambassador in ...

data.name: Sbatti il mostro in prima pagina
data.description: A populist right-wing tabloid newspaper tries to derail the official police investigation of a brutal murder of a young girl in order to help the fascist and right-wing candidates it supports in the upcoming elections.

data.name: Godzilla vs. Gigan
data.description: A manga artist becomes suspicious of his employers when a garbled message is discovered on tape. As he forms a team to investigate, Godzilla and Anguirus set out to help defeat the invaders.

data.name: Blacula
data.description: An ancient African prince, turned into a vampire by Dracula himself, finds himself in modern Los Angeles.

data.name: The Last House on the Left

data.name: Frenzy
data.description: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

data.name: State of Siege
data.description: Using the interrogation of a US counterinsurgency agent as a backdrop, the film explores the consequences of the struggle between Uruguay's government and the leftist Tupamaro guerrillas.

data.name: Lady Sings the Blues
data.description: The story of the troubled life and career of the legendary Jazz singer, Billie Holiday.

data.name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Sword of Vengeance
data.description: The story of a Ronin (i.e. a masterless samurai) who wanders the countryside of Japan with his small child, having various adventures.

data.name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart at the River Styx
data.description: Trailed by a clan of female ninja, Ogami is paid to assassinate a clan traitor accompanied by three killers known as the Gods of Death.

data.name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart in Peril
data.description: Ogami is hired to kill a tattooed female assassin. Gunbei Yagyu, an enemy samurai, happens upon Ogami's son, and sees his chance for revenge.

data.name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart to Hades
data.description: Ogami Itto volunteers to be tortured by the yakuza to save a prostitute and is hired by their leader to kill an evil chamberlain.

data.name: Sisters
data.description: A small-time reporter tries to convince the police she saw a murder in the apartment across from hers.

data.name: The Hitchhikers
data.description: Maggie learns she's pregnant so she runs away from home. Before long she gets involved with some other girls on their own who have found a way of supporting themselves. She joins them in ...

data.name: The Big Bird Cage

A bookshop renowned for its rare works is mysteriously and completely filled with copies of a book entitled 1, which doesn't appear to have a publisher or author.
